text package¶

Submodules¶

text.closeness module¶

Object representation of the weighted distance between two tokens in a text.

class text.closeness.Closeness(term, close_to, closeness, paragraph_id=-1)¶

Bases: object

Object representation to describe how close/relevant two terms are to each other.

text.paragraph module¶

Object representation of a Paragraph in a text.

class text.paragraph.Paragraph(paragraph_id: int, sentences: [<class 'text.sentence.Sentence'>], text=None)¶

Bases: object

Object representation of a paragraph.

text.sentence module¶

class text.sentence.Sentence(sentence_id: int, tokens: {<class 'str'>: <class 'str'>})¶

Bases: object

Object representation of POS tagged sentences. Has a dictionary of token -> POS-tag pairs.
